common.unknownErrorMessage: Detail of error message is not available

message.fetchCoinsDataError: Unable to fetch data about cryptoassets.
message.fetchCoinStatsError: Unable to refresh the price of cryptoasset
message.emailFormatError: Enter email address in correct format 'example@email.com'
message.passwordFormatError: Password must be at least 4 characters long
message.userLoggedOutInvalidToken: User was automatically signed-out -> token expired

NULL_OR_EMPTY.title: Empty Field
NULL_OR_EMPTY.message: Input field is null or empty.

INCORRECT_PASSWORD.title: Wrong Password
INCORRECT_PASSWORD.message: Provided password does not match user password.

USER_ALREADY_EXISTS.title: User Already Exists
USER_ALREADY_EXISTS.message: User with same username / email already exists.

USER_NOT_FOUND.title: User Not Found
USER_NOT_FOUND.message: User does not exist for provided username / email.

INVALID_JWT_TOKEN.title: Invalid Token
INVALID_JWT_TOKEN.message: JWT token has invalid structure or was expired.

ACCESS_DENIED.title: Access Denied
ACCESS_DENIED.message: User has insufficient access rights to perform the action.

AUTHENTICATION_GENERAL_FAILURE.title: Authentication Failed
AUTHENTICATION_GENERAL_FAILURE.message: Unable to authenticate the user (e.g. missing authentication token, etc.).
